item.description: This Meetup has many topics falling under the themes of personal and spiritual growth, awakening, the human energy system, angels, developing intuition, mediumship events, healing, spiritual cinema and much more.  Classes have included topics like forgiveness, goddess energy, law of attraction and the energy system, your seven sacred centers (chakras), embracing your shadow, and much more.  SoulCollage, a fun expression of the soul through making a deck of "cards" runs the first Sunday of each month.  Divine Openings, an enlightenment activation, occurs the third Thursday of every month. A group clearing with RYSE (Realizing Your Sublime Energies) happens every month, usually during the week of the full moon.  It's very relaxing and the peace stays with you.  Judy as well as guest experts conduct groups to bring in divine light and love.  Join us for learning, sharing and support and how to stay aligned and spread divine light during these challenging times.  Two gifted psychic mediums offer regular programs.  Everything in this Meetup is meant to insipire us toward light, healing and awakening. See full schedule at www.AHigherBalance.com.
item.name: Evolving Beings
